Amir Johnson is 38 years old.

Amir Johnson was born in Los Angeles, California.

Amir Johnson was born on May 1, 1987.

Amir Johnson is 6-9 (206 cm) tall.

Amir Johnson weighed 240 lbs (108 kg) when playing.

Amir Johnson is not in the Hall of Fame.

Amir Johnson was drafted by Detroit Pistons, 2nd round (26th pick, 56th overall), 2005 NBA Draft.

Power Forward, Center, and Small Forward.

When did Amir Johnson retire?

Amir Johnson last played in 2019.

What is Amir Johnson's net worth?

Amir Johnson made at least $79,456,857 playing professional basketball.

Amir Johnson made $12,000,000 in 2016.

What did Amir Johnson average?

Amir Johnson averaged 7.0 points, 5.4 rebounds, and 1.2 assists per game.

Amir Johnson won 0 championships.
